article.div: I'm planning on graduating in Summer 2018 and I'm on the job market for academic positions. (CV, other materials will follow in November)

div.div:
Email: antoinek@cs.washington.edu
Office: CSE 591
Address:
University of Washington
Computer Science & Engineering
Box 352350
Seattle, WA 98195-2350, USA

div.p:
I am currently a PhD student in the systems lab of the
Computer Science and Engineering department at the University of Washington with
Tom Anderson as my advisor. In addition I am collaborating closely with Simon Peter and
Arvind Krishnamurthy. My research interests lie in the general area of operating systems, and I am currently working on end-host network performance.
